General.Name: Arabian Cement Co
General.Description: Arabian Cement Company engages in the production, trading, and selling of cement primarily in Saudi Arabia and Jordan. It also provides clinker, building materials, derivatives, and other related products. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Arab Cement Company Building, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 23523-2113
